alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 16 at 9:24AM CDT until March 16 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Chilton County in central Alabama... Northeastern Perry County in central Alabama... North Central Dallas County in south central Alabama... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 924 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen over the last couple of hours. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Oakmulgee. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
